title: Battery Tech And Fusion Dominate Big Energy Tech Funding Rounds - Crunchbase News
content: Battery Tech And Fusion Dominate Big Energy Tech Funding Rounds  Crunchbase News
description: The International Energy Agency's most recent report outlining the initiatives required to slash fossil fuel consumption and shift to cleaner sources says getting the world on track to limit global warming to around 1.5Â°C will require investment of nearly $4 trillion annually by 2030.
